snippet: The company, which is aiming to build an Android-based gaming console for under $100, raised nearly 10 times its original goal. But the company has plenty of hurdles ahead.
abstract: The company, which is aiming to build an Android-based gaming console for under $100, raised nearly 10 times its original goal. But the company has plenty of hurdles ahead.

headline.main: Ouya Game Console Ends Kickstarter Campaign With $8.5 Million
headline.print_headline: Android Console Gets $8.5 Million From a Crowd
